trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around April 11th 2002
divs: sighting detailsi live in lincoln park, michigan, just south of detroit. i had gone out on mypatio at 2:15 a.m. on 4\10\02 to have a cigarette and was looking at the bigdipper because the sky was so clear and i noticed about 10 flying objects movingsoundlessly across the sky. they were flying in a v formation. the objectscontinued to move northwesterly until they were very faint. i woke my husbandup but by the time we went outside, the objects had faded into the horizon. icould still make them out but my husband saw nothing. i would really love toknow if anyone else saw what i saw. please contact me regarding any othersightings related to this one. i need to know that someone else saw theseobjects. thank you.
